title: Health Assessment Questionnaire
description: A questionnaire to assess general health and well-being.

questions.text: How often do you engage in physical exercise?
Do you have any chronic health conditions?
On a scale of 1 to 10, how would you rate your overall health?
How many servings of fruits and vegetables do you consume daily?
Do you have a family history of any of the following conditions? (Select all that apply)
